title: Low Use
content: Users typically used the app once or twice, then never again.

title: Poor User Experience
content: Application was not optimized for mobile devices and did not follow best practices.

title: Poor Accessibility
content: Application was not WCAG 2.0 compliant and lacked key usability features.

title: Negative Feedback
content: App score was low, and negative feedback centered on login and billing experience.

title: Behind Competition
content: Application was far behind our competitors in providing our users with value.

title: Difficult to Navigate
content: Users were getting lost in the app when looking for key features.

title: Patterns Among Competition
content: Competitors have been solving similar problems and share common design patterns.

title: Homeowners Want More
content: Education, curiosity, and enjoyment were key motivators for homeowners engaging in similar apps to ours.
